title: Fintech Statements & Transaction Analysis

sections.title: Smart Statements & Categorization
sections.content:
Modern banking apps don't just show a list of numbers; they use AI to categorize your spending automatically.

- **Categorization**: Grouping transactions into types (e.g., Groceries, Travel, Rent).
- **Merchant**: The business or store where you bought something.
- **Subscription**: A recurring payment for a service (e.g., Netflix, Spotify).
- **Cashback**: A percentage of your spending that the bank gives back to you.
- **Insights**: AI-driven analysis of your spending habits.
- **Tagging**: Adding custom labels to transactions (e.g., #Vacation2023).
- **Refund**: When money is returned to your account after a return.

```mermaid
graph LR

    D --> F[AI Categorization]
```

sections.title: Irregular Verbs: Financial History
sections.content:
Irregular verbs change their form completely in the past. These are essential for describing financial activities.

**Key Financial Irregular Verbs:**
- **Buy -> Bought**: *I bought crypto on the dip.*
- **Sell -> Sold**: *He sold his tech shares yesterday.*
- **Pay -> Paid**: *We paid the monthly subscription fee.*
- **Send -> Sent**: *The app sent a real-time notification.*
- **Give -> Gave**: *The bank gave me 5% cashback.*
- **Spend -> Spent**: *She spent too much on entertainment last month.*
- **Take -> Took**: *I took a screenshot of the transaction ID.*

objectives: Identify merchants and spending categories on a digital statement
Understand the status of a transaction (Pending vs Settled)
Use irregular verbs to describe past financial movements
